name: Bugs Must Die
description: Shooting them with a machine gun, blasting them with missiles, dashing them with a vehicle, whipping them with an energy chain, or burning them with a napalm...No matter how you get it done, â€œALIEN BUGS MUST DIE!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP,  Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz i3 or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Additional Notes: Supports Xbox 360 controller or Direct Input compatible controller
